      • initializeAdminService

        public void initializeAdminService()
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function should be the first thing called by the Admin Console to initialize the servlet. If SQL config data migration is required, it will be done and periodic status updates will be written to the servlet output stream.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown when the DataConfig could not be initialized.

        findEntityIds in interface IWeaveEntityManagementService
        Parameters:
